coded_answer.p: Thank you for the programme you have organised for our visit to London. We think it will be a very interesting trip, especially the sightseeing by bus.

In our class, we have read an advertisement for the "London Fashion and Leisure Show", which will take place at the Central Exhibition Hall in London on Tuesday 14 March from 10:00 to 19:00. As we are going to be in London on this date, we think, it could be a great oppurtunityopportunity for us to go there because we are very interested in the latest fashions, make up, etc. and it is free for students.

Because of this reasonsreason, we would kindykindly ask you to change the programme, so that we could go to this especialparticular event. We suggest visiting the Science Museum in the afternoon on Wednesday 15 March and cancelingcancelling the Shoppingshopping on Tuesday 14 March.
Hoping onfor your agreement and looking forward to hearing from you.
